Crypt_HCEMD5.encodeMimeSelfRand ( $  data  ) 

Encrypt a block of data after MIME-encoding it, and include the random hash in the final output in plaintext so it can be retrieved and decrypted with only the secret key by decodeMimeSelfRand().

Parameters:
string The data to encrypt.
string The encrypted mime-encoded data, in the format: randkey.encrypted_data. public

Crypt_HCEMD5.decodeMimeSelfRand ( $  data  ) 

Decrypt a block of data and then MIME-decode it, using the random key stored in beginning of the ciphertext generated by encodeMimeSelfRand().

Parameters:
string The data to decrypt, in the format: randkey.encrypted_data.
Returns:
string The decrypted, mime-decoded data. public

Crypt_HCEMD5.binmd5 ( $  string  ) 

Support Functions Implment md5 hashing in php, though use the mhash() function if it is available.

Parameters:
string The string to hash.
Returns:
string The md5 mhash of the string. private
